Package edu.wpi.disco.game.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action  
    AddActorAction
    Add or reactivate an actor
    ChooseTTSayOptionAction
    Execute a TTSay utterance task
    ExecuteTaskAction
    Encapsulates creation and execution of a new task instance
    LevelReadyAction
    Sets the ready flag.
    LoadModelAction
    Load a task model into the interaction containing the given actors
    PauseDebugAction
    Send the NWayInteraction into console debug mode
    RemoveActorAction
    Deactivate an actor
